PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01762024-03-01PMO
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of TIMOTHY A. BERUBE, part-time member of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, for the period he is acting as President of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, effective October 14, 2023, until such time as he is no longer required to act as President.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing the remuneration of TIMOTHY A. BERUBE, part-time member of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, for the period he is acting as President of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, effective October 14, 2023, until such time as he is no longer required to act as President.
